name: The Route (Super Early Alpha)
description:
This is so far only the core of the game and has no real features added to it yet, mainly meant for testing
Controls:

AD: going to sides 

QE: Rotating 45 degrees 

W: Dubbles constant forward push while hold down

S: Reverses the constant forward push while hold down

Space: Jumps (can jump 2 times per ground touch) 

Shift: Makes you flat and go down a bit
